title: Phase 3: Migrate CI/CD workflows from Poetry to uv
description: Update 4 GitHub Actions workflow files. Replace Poetry curl install with astral-sh/setup-uv@v5 action (includes caching). Replace all poetry run with uv run, poetry install with uv sync --frozen. Remove Poetry configure steps and manual cache steps. Fix lint job to use ruff instead of black/flake8 (matching actual project tooling). Update cache keys from poetry.lock hash to uv.lock hash. Update license-check.yml trigger path from poetry.lock to uv.lock. Files: .github/workflows/ci.yml, .github/workflows/coverage.yml, .github/workflows/security.yml, .github/workflows/license-check.yml.

title: Phase 1: Migrate pyproject.toml and lock file from Poetry to uv
description: Foundation of the entire migration. Convert pyproject.toml: fix PEP 508 dependency format (remove parentheses), rename [tool.poetry.scripts] to [project.scripts], convert Poetry dependency groups to [dependency-groups] (PEP 735), replace build-system from poetry-core to hatchling, delete all [tool.poetry.*] sections. Delete poetry.lock, run uv lock to generate uv.lock, verify with uv sync --group dev --group test. Files: pyproject.toml, poetry.lock (delete), uv.lock (create).

title: Phase 2: Migrate Dockerfile from Poetry to uv
description: Replace Poetry installation in Docker builder stage with uv. Key changes: remove curl from apt-get, add COPY --from=ghcr.io/astral-sh/uv:latest for uv binary, set UV_PROJECT_ENVIRONMENT=/usr/local to install into system site-packages (preserves existing runtime stage COPY pattern), replace poetry install with uv sync --no-install-project --no-dev --frozen, update COPY to reference uv.lock instead of poetry.lock. Remove SHELL pipefail directive (no curl pipe). Runtime stage needs no changes. File: Dockerfile.

title: Phase 4: Migrate pre-commit config from Poetry to uv
description: Update .pre-commit-config.yaml: change osv-scanner hook args from poetry.lock to uv.lock format, update files pattern. Replace poetry-check and poetry-lock-check local hooks with single uv-lock-check hook (entry: uv lock --check). Update CI skip list from poetry hook names to uv hook name. Update section header comment from Poetry/Dependency Checks to uv/Dependency Checks. File: .pre-commit-config.yaml.
